a.detail: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls
a.summary: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls

i.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a magical cyst below
i.summary: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into a magical cyst below

m.detail: A putrid odor fills the corridor
m.summary: A putrid odor fills the corridor

r.detail: A chute descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down
r.summary: A chute descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down

v.detail: Someone has scrawled "Watch out for basilisk" in orcish runes here

w.detail: Withered corpses are nailed to the corridor walls

details.temperature:
Cold (unprotected creatures must succeed on a Fortitude saving
    throw every hour (DC 15, +1 per previous check) or take 1d6 points
    of non-lethal damage; a creature that takes any non-lethal damage
    from cold exposure suffers from hypothermia and is fatigued)

monster: 4 x 1st Level Warrior Goblin

settings.name: The Secret Warrens of the Wyrm Count

wandering_monsters.2: 14 x Tiny Monstrous Centipede (vermin), scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.3: 1 x Troglodyte Zombie, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.4: 1 x 1st Level Warrior Svirfneblin (gnome), trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.5: 2 x Dire Rat, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.6: 1 x Spider Swarm, consumed by disease and madness
